channel.title: Straight-Talking Business Coaching
channel.itunes:author: Paul McGee
channel.description: Welcome to the Straight-Talking Business Coaching video podcast, a series of free videos from The S.U.M.O. Guy, Paul McGee, the inspirational author of S.U.M.O. (Shut Up, Move On) and S.U.M.O. Your Relationships. In each episode he’ll take you through the thinking behind the S.U.M.O. philosophy and show how using the S.U.M.O. principles can help you perform better at work, enjoy a better life and build better relationships with those around you. This podcast is packed with insights into organisations and individuals from someone who’s been there and done it.
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the Straight-Talking Business Coaching video podcast, a series of free videos from The S.U.M.O. Guy, Paul McGee, the inspirational author of S.U.M.O. (Shut Up, Move On) and S.U.M.O. Your Relationships. In each episode he’ll take you through the thinking behind the S.U.M.O. philosophy and show how using the S.U.M.O. principles can help you perform better at work, enjoy a better life and build better relationships with those around you. This podcast is packed with insights into organisations and individuals from someone who’s been there and done it.
channel.itunes:keywords: Business, Entrepreneurship, Starting a Business, Leadership, Management, Careers, Career, Work, Self-help, Self Help, Personal Development, Capstone, SUMO, Book

item.title: The S.U.M.O. Way
item.itunes:author: Paul McGee
item.description: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy, Paul McGee, explains what this S.U.M.O. thing is all about. He talks about his first job and how using S.U.M.O. can help you in your relationships as well as your career development.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy, Paul McGee, explains what this S.U.M.O. thing is all about. He talks about his first job and how using S.U.M.O. can help you in your relationships as well as your career development.
item.itunes:keywords: Business, Entrepreneurship, Starting a Business, Leadership, Management, Careers, Career, Work, Self-help, Self Help, Personal Development, Capstone, SUMO, Book

item.title: S.U.M.O. Your Realities
item.itunes:author: Paul McGee
item.description: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy looks at how we interpret our experiences. You'll hear about the neighbours from hell and the bit about the beach ball - stories that will help you understand the factors that influence the way you experience reality.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy looks at how we interpret our experiences. You'll hear about the neighbours from hell and the bit about the beach ball - stories that will help you understand the factors that influence the way you experience reality.
item.itunes:keywords: Business, Entrepreneurship, Starting a Business, Leadership, Management, Careers, Career, Work, Self-help, Self Help, Personal Development, Capstone, SUMO, Book

item.title: S.U.M.O. Your Attitude
item.itunes:author: Paul McGee
item.description: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy, Paul McGee, talks about dealing with people. He talks about a particularly memorable experience of his own and explains how using his changing your attitude can help you get on better with those around you.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy, Paul McGee, talks about dealing with people. He talks about a particularly memorable experience of his own and explains how using his changing your attitude can help you get on better with those around you.
item.itunes:keywords: Business, Entrepreneurship, Starting a Business, Leadership, Management, Careers, Career, Work, Self-help, Self Help, Personal Development, Capstone, SUMO, Book

item.title: The Highjacker
item.itunes:author: Paul McGee
item.description: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy talks about The Highjacker - the person who tries to bring every conversation back to them by topping what you've just said. You'll pick up some essential tips on how to deal with them.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy talks about The Highjacker - the person who tries to bring every conversation back to them by topping what you've just said. You'll pick up some essential tips on how to deal with them.
item.itunes:keywords: Business, Entrepreneurship, Starting a Business, Leadership, Management, Careers, Career, Work, Self-help, Self Help, Personal Development, Capstone, SUMO, Book

item.title: The Awfuliser
item.itunes:author: Paul McGee
item.description: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy, Paul McGee, talks about The Awfuliser - the person who makes you feel worse about a problem once you've shared it with them. You'll find out exactly what you need to do to handle them.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy, Paul McGee, talks about The Awfuliser - the person who makes you feel worse about a problem once you've shared it with them. You'll find out exactly what you need to do to handle them.
item.itunes:keywords: Business, Entrepreneurship, Starting a Business, Leadership, Management, Careers, Career, Work, Self-help, Self Help, Personal Development, Capstone, SUMO, Book

item.title: The Whinger
item.itunes:author: Paul McGee
item.description: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy talks about The Whinger - the kind of person who believes that every silver lining has a cloud. You'll hear about the danger of being exposed to passive whinging and how to deal with whingers without losing your cool!
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy talks about The Whinger - the kind of person who believes that every silver lining has a cloud. You'll hear about the danger of being exposed to passive whinging and how to deal with whingers without losing your cool!
item.itunes:keywords: Business, Entrepreneurship, Starting a Business, Leadership, Management, Careers, Career, Work, Self-help, Self Help, Personal Development, Capstone, SUMO, Book

item.title: The Happy
item.itunes:author: Paul McGee
item.description: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy, Paul McGee, talks about The Happy - the kind of person who wants to hoover up all negative emotions but lacks the ability to connect with others. The Happy means well, but you need to know how to handle them.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy, Paul McGee, talks about The Happy - the kind of person who wants to hoover up all negative emotions but lacks the ability to connect with others. The Happy means well, but you need to know how to handle them.
item.itunes:keywords: Business, Entrepreneurship, Starting a Business, Leadership, Management, Careers, Career, Work, Self-help, Self Help, Personal Development, Capstone, SUMO, Book

item.title: The Ditherer
item.itunes:author: Paul McGee
item.description: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy talks about The Ditherer - the kind of person who can't make a decision for fear of getting it wrong. You'll pick up plenty of tips on how to deal with them.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy talks about The Ditherer - the kind of person who can't make a decision for fear of getting it wrong. You'll pick up plenty of tips on how to deal with them.
item.itunes:keywords: Business, Entrepreneurship, Starting a Business, Leadership, Management, Careers, Career, Work, Self-help, Self Help, Personal Development, Capstone, SUMO, Book

item.title: The Commander
item.itunes:author: Paul McGee
item.description: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy talks about The Commander - goal and task oriented people who can be a little insensitive to other people's feelings. You'll hear about what it's like to be a control freak and the joys of ticking things off to-do lists.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, The S.U.M.O. Guy talks about The Commander - goal and task oriented people who can be a little insensitive to other people's feelings. You'll hear about what it's like to be a control freak and the joys of ticking things off to-do lists.
